name: The Cascades
description: The Cascades - A powerful trio unite. 5 luxurious towers of 63 floors each, spread across 7.34 acres, carefully balances home, work and luxury hospitality, and has been designed in accordance with Vastu principles.

name: Sattva LakeRidge
description: Sattva Lakeridge - Ultra premium residencies facing the panoramic views of Osman Sagar and Kokapet Lake meet the lavishness of Neopolis Hyderabad.

name: Poulomi Palazzo
description: 55 STORIES OF LUXURY-The crux of luxury living is impeccable planning, so your home and surroundings imbibe a smooth flow and easy living. Immaculate planning translates to a seamless home, holds the best influx of light and air, and is the perfect canvas to create a home to your taste.

name: Western Marina
description: Nature-Infused Urban Living at Nanakramguda, Gachibowli.Unmatched Grandeur with modern minimalism, resulting in an exclusive & harmonious space designed for an unparalleled experience at Nakaramguda, Gachibowli

name: Auro Realty Kohinoor
description: 3 & 4 BHK Apartment in Hitech City Experience Comfort With a touch of Glamour
